name: Expand Diabetes Clinic Slots
description: Add 2 additional clinic sessions per week for women with gestational diabetes. Requires coordination across teams and dedicated space.

name: Launch Group Education Sessions
description: Replace some 1:1 appointments with group education sessions covering nutrition, glucose monitoring, and birth preparation.

name: Tighten Triage Criteria
description: Prioritise high-risk cases (T1DM, high HbA1c) for face-to-face appointments. Lower-risk women to virtual/phone follow-up.

name: Increase Escalation Checks & Audits
description: Weekly case review meetings and monthly audit of high-risk transfers to consultant-led care.

name: Standardise Guidelines & Handover
description: Implement consistent documentation templates and structured handover protocols across all teams.

name: Enhanced Incident Review Process
description: Rapid investigation and feedback loop for any adverse outcomes or near-misses.

name: Remote Glucose Monitoring Rollout
description: Digital platform for women to upload readings. Requires setup, training, and ongoing data management.

name: SMS Appointment Reminders
description: Automated text reminders 48 hours before appointments to reduce DNA rates.

name: Expand Telehealth Options
description: Video consultations for routine follow-ups, reducing travel burden for women in rural areas.

name: Protected Learning Time
description: Monthly half-day for case discussion, skills updates, and peer support. Reduces immediate capacity.

name: Bank/Agency Cover
description: Temporary staff to cover gaps. Quick capacity boost but high cost and potential continuity issues.

name: Staff Wellbeing Initiative
description: Access to clinical supervision, reflective practice sessions, and occupational health support.

name: Community Outreach Programme
description: Partner with community groups to reach underserved populations earlier in pregnancy.

name: Enhanced Interpreter Services
description: On-demand language support for consultations, reducing miscommunication risks.
